description: Get all the data on skill counts.
This route returns an array of arrays.
Get the latest data about in demand skills.
Get the average of all the skill counts.
Get all the data about a certain skill.
Replace ':/skill' with a valid skill in the database for your AJAX call. See drop-down box below for currently available skills.
Get the latest data about a certain skill.
Replace ':/skill' with a valid skill in the database for your AJAX call. See drop-down box below for currently available skills.
Get the average of all the data about a certain skill.
Replace ':/skill' with a valid skill in the database for your AJAX call. See drop-down box below for currently available skills.
